DOC.brief_summary: Purpose To evaluate whether add transversus abdominis plane block patient undergo elective laparoscopic hysterectomy reduce Patient-controlled analgesia ( PCA ) morphine requirement first 24 hour postoperatively . Forty-six patient undergo laparoscopic hysterectomy randomize two group : 1 . Group treatment TAP ( n=23 ) receive follow analgesia : - US guide transversus abdominis plane block perform 40ml 0.375 % levobupivacaine ( 20 ml per side ) general anaesthesia induction , surgical start - Morphine PCA load dose i.v . titrate PACU nurse pain > 5/10 rest 2 . Group control receive : - Morphine PCA load dose i.v . titrate PACU nurse pain > 5/10 rest Primary Outcome Measures : Morphine consumption ( mg ) ( Time Frame : 24 hour ) Groups TAP Control Secondary Outcome Measures : - Pain rest movement quantify Numerical Rating Scores ( 0-10 ) pain rest bed cough first 24 hour postoperatively - Time PACU dimission , evaluate patient 's achievement White 's score > = 12/14 - Time home discharge , evaluate patient 's achievement PADDS score > = 9 - Functional patient capacity measure surgery whenever White 's score > = 12 reach ( 2minute walk test ) - Eventual side effect nausea/vomiting
